item.title: Bags of builders' rubble, 22nd November
item.description:
Dumped on Glengall Road, opposite number 5. When I took the photo yesterday there were 3, now there are at least 4. There are also these bags dropped opposite the entrance to Glengall Business Centre and closer to Old Kent Road near the public bin in the little park area

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glengall Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London

item.title: Bags of builders' rubble, 22nd November
item.description:

item.title: Bowes Road N11, 22nd November
item.description:
The pavements of Bowes Road N11 are a mess. They have not been swept or cleared of rubbish or leaves. The same rubbish has been in situ for over a month now and yet the Council have employed street sweepers. What exactly are they paid to do if not, clear the pavements.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bowes Road, New Southgate, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
